pageContext.description: Both points of edge broken off.
pageContext.other: Width: edge 60mm; butt 23mm,Thickness: centre 43mm; 12mm,Weight: 14 oz. = 396.893 gms
pageContext.collection: Municipal Museum, Hull, No. 155,Old label [No.] "3 Brompton"
pageContext.site: England,Yorkshire,Brompton-by-Northallerton,Presumably N.R., as formerly in collection with others from Bilsdale and Farndale, presumably Brompton near Northallerton.
pageContext.remarks: In the British Museum (Greenwell Collection) is a winged axe of this type from Brompton, NR, Yorks.: Evans, Anc. Br. Imps, p. 76: ACH yorks I 408: Which Brompton is not specified. Elger, Nth Yorks, p. 166.
